THE_VISION.summary: Schools buy the app. They own their data. Forever.
THE_VISION.philosophy: You deliver the tool. They own everything.

phase1_web.purpose: Perfect the product, prove the concept
phase1_web.when_done: When onboarding + dashboard + reports flow perfectly

phase2_native.purpose: The real product - schools own everything
